Control Name: Documents Changes—A process is in place to document system changes to support ongoing maintenance of the system and to support system users in performing their responsibilities.

control_attributes.Control: Documents Changes—A process is in place to document system changes to support ongoing maintenance of the system and to support system users in performing their responsibilities.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC8.1 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.
